channel.title: Abouts on Pratik Kokil

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Pratik Kokil, a design engineer interested in Electric Vehicles, Stand-up comedy and all things under the sun (perpetually curious!).

You can find writings and technical projects / updates on this website.

You can contact me via LinkedIN or X.Com
